metadata.name: Script Interpreter Execution From Suspicious Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ep bypass ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -executionpolicy bypass ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -w hidden ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/e:javascript ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/e:jscript ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/e:vbscript ')) OR lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('cscript\.exe', 'mshta\.exe', 'wscript\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favorites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favourites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\contacts\\'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables
